title: Specialized care programs
content: If you're enrolled in a Copay or HSA medical option through BCBSIL or UHC, you have access to the Carrum Health Medical and Surgery Benefit ("Carrum Health"), Hinge Health and Vida Health. If you are enrolled in the BCBSIL myVirtualCare Access option, you're eligible for Carrum Health and Hinge Health. These innovative programs can help you get better care and added value.
